ruleset.name: Basic XML
ruleset.description: The Basic XML Ruleset contains a collection of good practices which everyone should follow.

rule.name: MistypedCDATASection
rule.message: Potentialy mistyped CDATA section with extra [ at beginning or ] at the end.
rule.description: An XML CDATA section begins with a <!CDATA[ marker, which has only one [, and ends with a ]]> marker, which has only two ].
rule.example: An extra [ looks like <!CDATA[[]]>, and an extra ] looks like <!CDATA[]]]>.
